svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
June 22, 2024" date: "2024-06-22"
Eth News and Links
Blob fee market issues, SEC drops Consensys case and CertiK withdrew ~$3M from Kraken
without authorization
All core devs
* All core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) #190 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade:
pectra-devnet-1 : aim to launch next week with subset of clients, will include
execution layer triggered withdrawals & current version of EIP7702 EIP7702 : discussion
of delegation designation proposal (revoke by redelegating), breakout #5 June 26 EOF :
rebasing to build on top of Prague upgrade, EOF readiness tracker
* Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: pectra-devnet-1 : aim to launch next week with
subset of clients, will include execution layer triggered withdrawals & current version
of EIP7702 EIP7702 : discussion of delegation designation proposal (revoke by
redelegating), breakout #5 June 26 EOF : rebasing to build on top of Prague upgrade,
EOF readiness tracker
* pectra-devnet-1 : aim to launch next week with subset of clients, will include
execution layer triggered withdrawals & current version of EIP7702
* EIP7702 : discussion of delegation designation proposal (revoke by redelegating),
breakout #5 June 26
EIP7702 : discussion of delegation designation proposal (revoke by redelegating),
* EOF : rebasing to build on top of Prague upgrade,
EOF : rebasing to build on top of Prague upgrade,
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade, likely targeting Q1 2025
* Frangio: ERC721/1155 issue with EOF , safe transfer checks if token recipient is a
contract using code size
Osaka + F starname upgrade
* Verkle implementers call #19 : transition tests mostly passing on Geth, support
increasing code size limit, testnet relaunch targeting July & preimage distribution
discussion
* transition tests mostly passing on Geth, support increasing code size limit, testnet
relaunch targeting July & preimage distribution discussion
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.78% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.78% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Consensus layer: Prysm 38% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
* Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
* Blob fee market issues, highlighted by price spike : Potuz: market for blobs is
broken Terence: ideas to fix Data viz of slot inclusion rates and analysis of blob
market strategies
Blob fee market issues, highlighted by price spike :
* Potuz: market for blobs is broken
Potuz: market for blobs is broken
* Terence: ideas to fix
Terence: ideas to fix
* Data viz of slot inclusion rates and analysis of blob market strategies
Data viz of slot inclusion rates and analysis of blob market strategies
* Dankrad: blob strategies to help self builders
Dankrad: blob strategies to help self builders
* ePBS: ePBS breakout #3 Terence: ePBS FAQ
ePBS:
* ePBS breakout #3
ePBS breakout #3
* Terence: ePBS FAQ
Terence: ePBS FAQ
Research
* Anders Elowsson: analysis of burn incentives in MEV pricing auctions
Anders Elowsson: analysis of burn incentives in MEV pricing auctions
* Fork-choice enforced inclusion lists (FOCIL): committee-based inclusion list design
Fork-choice enforced inclusion lists (FOCIL): committee-based inclusion list design
Client Releases
* Consensus layer: Prysm v5.0.4 : fixes p2p peer for Windows users, Beacon API
retrieving old blobs & initial sync avoids redundant blob downloads Teku v24.6.0 :
performance improvements & fixes; v24.6.1 : fix for v24.6.0 startup failure
Consensus layer:
* Prysm v5.0.4 : fixes p2p peer for Windows users, Beacon API retrieving old blobs &
initial sync avoids redundant blob downloads
Prysm v5.0.4 : fixes p2p peer for Windows users, Beacon API retrieving old blobs &
* Teku v24.6.0 : performance improvements & fixes; v24.6.1 : fix for v24.6.0 startup
failure
Teku v24.6.0 : performance improvements & fixes; v24.6.1 : fix for v24.6.0 startup
* Execution layer: Nethermind v1.27.0 : ~150% improvement to block processing &
intra-block cache
Execution layer:
* Nethermind v1.27.0 : ~150% improvement to block processing & intra-block cache
For Stakers
* Lighthouse: guide to missed attestations , common issues & tuning parameters
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP discussions proposal, highlight updates,
reviews & outstanding issues
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
* EIP discussions proposal, highlight updates, reviews & outstanding issues
* ERCs (application layer standards): ERC7725 : Exponential curves ERC7726 : Common
quote oracle Guide to writing an ERC
ERCs (application layer standards):
* ERC7725 : Exponential curves
ERC7725 : Exponential curves
* ERC7726 : Common quote oracle
ERC7726 : Common quote oracle
* Guide to writing an ERC
Guide to writing an ERC
* EIP.tools : view & search EIP/ERCs
EIP.tools : view & search EIP/ERCs
Stuff for developers
* Foundry afterInvariant hooks: test state at end of an invariant test run
Foundry afterInvariant hooks: test state at end of an invariant test run
* Transience (Solidity library): manage transient storage
Transience (Solidity library): manage transient storage
* Vyper v0.4.0 : adds module system (code reuse via composition), Venom optimizer
pipeline & archive creation of a build for sharing
Vyper v0.4.0 : adds module system (code reuse via composition), Venom optimizer
* Sneko : terminal GUI for compiling Vyper & Solidity contracts
Sneko : terminal GUI for compiling Vyper & Solidity contracts
* Alloy v0.1 : rewrite of ethers-rs & Solidity type system in Rust
Alloy v0.1 : rewrite of ethers-rs & Solidity type system in Rust
* Revmc : EVM bytecode to native code compiler
Revmc : EVM bytecode to native code compiler
* ethPandaOps: build an L2 devnet using Kurtosis ethereum-package
ethPandaOps: build an L2 devnet using Kurtosis ethereum-package
* Viem NonceManager : manage/generate nonces for a local accounts transactions
Deployless Calls : call a function on a contract that hasnâ€™t been deployed
Viem
* NonceManager : manage/generate nonces for a local accounts transactions
NonceManager : manage/generate nonces for a local accounts transactions
* Deployless Calls : call a function on a contract that hasnâ€™t been deployed
* Vacp2p stealth address kit v0.2.0 : adds pallas & vesta, bw6_761 & baby_jub_jub
curves
Vacp2p stealth address kit v0.2.0 : adds pallas & vesta, bw6_761 & baby_jub_jub curves
* Relayscan bids archive : builder bids for all relays, uploaded nightly, CC0 license
Relayscan bids archive : builder bids for all relays, uploaded nightly, CC0 license
Security
* Kraken balance inflation vulnerability disclosed & patched CertiK withdrew ~$3M over
5 days before reporting, funds now returned
* CertiK withdrew ~$3M over 5 days before reporting, funds now returned
Ecosystem
* Devcon: ticket raffle & auction live on Arbitrum, 20 tickets for highest auction
bids, 184 tickets for raffle winners, minimum entry is 0.08 ETH
Enterprise
* Enterprise Ethereum Alliance: survey on business usage of Ethereum
Job Listings
* Alchemy - Wallet Services: Engineering Manager and Full-Stack Engineer
Alchemy - Wallet Services: Engineering Manager and Full-Stack Engineer
* Nethermind: Preconfirmations Senior Engineer , Protocol Researcher , Site Reliability
Engineer , Senior Content Marketing & Senior Marketing Manager
Nethermind: Preconfirmations Senior Engineer , Protocol Researcher , Site Reliability
* IMC: Quant Developer for DeFi and MEV focused team
IMC: Quant Developer for DeFi and MEV focused team
* Privacy and Scaling Explorations: ZK Circuits Engineer
Privacy and Scaling Explorations: ZK Circuits Engineer
* Gnosis is hiring: Discord Moderator and Senior Web3 Software Dev (Wallet)
Gnosis is hiring: Discord Moderator and Senior Web3 Software Dev (Wallet)
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 1.9 to 95.6 gwei, 6.5 gwei average; zero net
issuance at 23.5 gwei Blob gas: spiked to 8,405 gwei; 251 ETH burnt 12.5k ETH net
issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
* Gas: 1.9 to 95.6 gwei, 6.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.5 gwei
Gas: 1.9 to 95.6 gwei, 6.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.5 gwei
* Blob gas: spiked to 8,405 gwei; 251 ETH burnt
Blob gas: spiked to 8,405 gwei; 251 ETH burnt
* 12.5k ETH net issuance this week
12.5k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $3,387 - $3,632, currently $3,511, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $3,387 - $3,632, currently $3,511, all time high $4,878
* ETHBTC : currently 0.055 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.055 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Regulation/business/tokens
* SEC formally notifies Consensys that it will not be charged
SEC formally notifies Consensys that it will not be charged
* Fortune : CFTC probing Jump Crypto
Fortune : CFTC probing Jump Crypto
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-june-22-2024
Upcoming Dates of Note
